WRITING.TEXT: Very poor choice of words.

The problem with "everything in moderation" is what "moderation" really means. Strictly speaking, moderation means the middle ground between two opposites, taking ideas from both spectrums. However, this approach does work with everything. Eating shit food in "moderation" generally doesn't work for those trying to eat healthy, lose weight, become superior athletes, etc. There are plenty of examples where "moderation" does not work.
Destroy the bot, we must.

WRITING.TITLE: NoFap and Batman
WRITING.TEXT:
This is my first post, and yes, it's supposed to be funny/stupid.
Anyway, I can across a clip from the movie Batman Begins that's applicable to NoFap. The key words are "pressure", "water supply", and "gonna blow". This scene is a great example of what happens when your trying to stop yourself in the middle of a session.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kbcbGakQg4A

A nice poem, but I have one of my own:
My face is red, my balls- are blue. Don't- fap, It's not good for you--.
As you can see, I was inspired by Emily *Dick*inson. Alright, I'm leaving now.
A cold shower and/or putting an ice pack on your groin can help relieve the pain.
Ask you anything? Giggity.
So, which art was it?

Let us say a final farewell to this unnamed hero, a hero who was once a brother, a fellow fapstronaut, who stood side by side by us in the war against porn, a war against a degrading and destructive act, a monster as deadly as the Sirens. Let us pay homage to the man who survived 76 hurricanes, each greater than the last, only for his ship to sink upon the 77th hurricane. He fought to keep ship afloat, through biting wind and laughing waves, to no avail. At the bottom of the ocean he lies a hero, an inspiration for us all. His courage will never be forgotten. With these words in our hearts, I, and my NoFap brothers say a final farewell. Rest in Peace, brother, rest in peace.
He and his comment disappeared. Looks like his ship sunk.
Oh, cum on.
I'm glad we have some humor finally cumming to NoFap. The....hardness and rigidity of this lifestyle was starting to get to me.
The journey is definitely.....*hard* at the beginning. Stay strong, cum hell or high water.
Not if the ship is hit with 77 hurricanes.
This was fapulous? Giggity.
As *hard* on yourself? Giggity.
Heh, just made it 7 days too, for the first time in months. Let's continue to stay strong on the journey.
Hey, I had a dream of making a NoFap Pun Post. Looks like you beat me to it. Good thing I came to the write place. I would have a pun challenge with you but you might go to hard on me.
The girls didn't know, that's the point. By abstaining from PMO, the top rated guy had qualities that were desirous to females (pretty sure that's the claim the post is making).
You should reset to -20 days. Same number as your IQ, lol.

Don't let it get you down, what happens when your subconscious doesn't count. Anyway, I managed to find a post with a similiar incident: https://www.reddit.com/r/NoFap/comments/yr4a8/almost_relapsed_while_still_mostly_asleep_last/
Stay strong from here on out!
Incidents like this have been reported before. However, because you did not make a conscious decision to fap, this is not a reset. Let me try and find some of those posts...

Wet dreams are perfectly natural. Even though they kinda suck, it's a part of the reboot process. As far as I know, wet dreams can happen regardless of whether your dreaming or not. Here are some links on wet dreams: https://www.reddit.com/r/NoFap/comments/2o1ffx/wet_dream_post_to_end_all_wet_dream_posts/
http://teens.webmd.com/boys/wet-dream-faq

Hmm, well your dreams don't necessarily have to be about jacking off. I'm a virgin too, and both my dreams involved actual sex. Actually, I've always wondered why my dreams felt so vivid and real about an experience I've never had before.
A particular lifestyle can be a challenge, no?
Both.
Glad to hear you overcame your urge. Stay strong here on out!
So, did you make it?
Yes, go back to -10 days, lol.
Looks like a solid plan. Stay strong on your journey!
A nice poem, but I have one of my own: My face is red, my balls- are blue. Don't- fap, It's not good for you--. As you can see, I was inspired by Emily *Dick*inson. Alright, I'm leaving now.
We all have had moments of weakness. Don't let it phase you, become even stronger from this.
It's possible. Do you not remember your wet dreams? I've had two such dreams and remembered them both.

Well, the temptation never really goes away. You get stronger, and the temptation gets weaker, but make no mistake, the temptation is always there.
As for activities/hobbies, ultimately you need to decide what you want to do. Cold showers, meditation, physical training, reading are all great things you would benefit from doing. But really, the list is endless. I personally enjoy dog training, archery, Muay Thai, hiking, and philosophy in my free time. Your interests however are yours alone and you need to decide what you enjoy doing and what is beneficial for you.
Pretty common experience when rebooting.
More like slowly shaving away at your brain.
And they say NoFap superpowers aren't real!
Yup, were on the same page there.
Just post you want an accountability partner.
Sorry, I'm having trouble understanding the last part of your sentence.
? I commented before you did.
I don't know, you might develop some very weird fetishes....

My face is red, my balls- are blue. Don't- fap, It's not good for you--.
As you can see, I was inspired by Emily *Dick*inson. Alright, I'm leaving now.

I'm currently trying to do this, with varied success. I've begun filling my time with other more meaningful activities to get away from the monitor. Still got a ways to go though.
This blew me away, pun intended.

Well the hike treated me like shit lol. I was feeling adventurous and decided to hike through the woods and up a steep hill, all covered in two feet of snow. It was really tiring trudging through the snow. Then I started to get blue balls, which made the trip more painful.
But even though it kinda sucked, I felt pretty alive during the hike. Definitely felt better than if I decided to stay home and fap. Your post gave me the idea to get out of the house and hike so thank you for that. I managed to kill my urge and keep my streak intact.
